actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell. Without written report.
Placed on the Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 1.
By Senator Pell from Committee on Foreign Relations filed written report. Ex. Report No. 102-3.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original executive resolution relating to the return of certain treaty amendments.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to return to the President: (1) a 1979 amendment to the International Convention on Load Lines, 1966, adopted at London, November 15, 1979; and (2) certain 1983 amendments to such Convention, adopted November 17, 1983.

titles.title: An original executive resolution relating to the return of certain treaty amendments.
